text: Adamantisaurus ( ) is a poorly-known genus of titanosaurian sauropod dinosaur from the Late Cretaceous of Brazil. It is only known from six tail vertebrae, but, as a sauropod, it can be assumed that this dinosaur was a very large animal with a long neck and tail. ==References== Category:Titanosaurs Category:Cretaceous dinosaurs
title: Adamantisaurus
